Mystic Tavern Owner Settlen:
Lollia is my only daughter. You should go talk to her while you are here. Hahaha.
We had her very late. She's precious to us. She's also very smart and kind... It was Lollia's idea to start telling stories to our customers.
Lollia's helping out a lot in the tavern, and she's also getting ready to meet new customers. Make sure to go to talk to her!
